edu.iub.pubmed.pagerank

Class PageRank

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iub.pubmed.pagerank.PageRank

  • public class PageRank
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the pagerank for all the nodes in the relevant graph for the keywords given in the input file and updates the Hetrogeneous graph to create contributed edges/relationships between paper nodes and keyword nodes
    Usage : javac PageRank
    java PageRank KeywordInputFile
    Author:
    Abhilash

    • Method Detail

      • loadKeyWords

        private void loadKeyWords(java.lang.String keywordFile)
        Loads the keywords from the file which has list of keywords for which page has to be calculated
        Parameters:
        keywordFile - - page rank keyword file

      • runPageRank

        public void runPageRank()
        Runs the Pagerank for each keyword of the input list. Following steps are involved for every iteration
        • Normalize the priors such that sum of all priors is 1.
        • Run the Jung PageRankWithPriors.evaluate method to calculate the page rank
        • Update the Hetrogeneous graph for the current keyword and nodes with authorithy greater than 0.0

      • updateHetrogeneousGraph

        private void updateHetrogeneousGraph()
        Updates the hetrogeneous graph to add the edges/relationships 'contributed' between keyword and paper nodes

      • findPriorWeight

        private void findPriorWeight(java.lang.String currentKeyWord)
        Calculates the total prior to normalize each prior .
        Parameters:
        currentKeyWord - - keyword in current iteration

      • hasKeyWord

        public boolean hasKeyWord(java.lang.String[] keywords,
                 java.lang.String keyword)
        Returns true if the given keyword is present in the list of actual keywords used in the paper
        Parameters:
        keywords - - list of actual keywords of paper.
        keyword - - current keyword in the page rank iteration
        Returns:
        - true if current keyword is one of actual keywords
